citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 on
12-SEP-16.
Knocked on door, honked, called and left message, waited 30 minutes. Licensee has not sent emails or text to
inform of their availability.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 on
12-SEP-16.
Knocked on door, honked, called and left message, waited 30 minutes.  Licensee has not sent emails or text to
inform of their availability.
